thread.title: Sessions says parents, children who enter country illegally could be separated

title: Sessions says parents, children who enter country illegally could be separated
text:
Sessions says parents, children who enter country illegally could be separated Monday, May 07, 2018 - 01:25
At the U.S.-Mexico border in San Diego, U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions said the illegal crossings trend ''must end'' and that if a child is being smuggled into the U.S., the child will be placed in protective custody. During Sessions' speech, a protester can be heard shouting in the background. Rough Cut
